description:
Dodge pirates, mines and sharks as you navigate your steamboat!  Trip on the Funny Boat is a port of the PyWeek March 2006 Team category winner.  Find details on the original game at http://funnyboat.sourceforge.net.

Art, music & original design: Copyright 2006-2007 Olli Etuaho, Joona Karjalainen, Pekka Kujansuu.
Port to JavaScript: Copyright 2010, 2011 Troy J. Farrell and Entheos Software.
versionNote: Version 0.1.0 is the first public release of Trip on the Funny Boat (JavaScript port).  This version includes music and sounds (using System Sounds.)  Known issue: music does not loop on Palm Pixi devices.
copyright: Copyright 2010, 2011 Troy J. Farrell, Entheos Soft
